job_details.Vacaturetitel: Python software engineer - ERP and business processes
job_details.Functieomschrijving:
We are looking for a Python software engineer who is not only technically skilled but also hands-on and pragmatic. In this role, you will be responsible for both guiding our technical direction and being actively involved in development tasks. You'll work closely with our small team to ensure that our technology supports our business goals, and you'll play a key role in building and growing the team as we scale., * ERP development and Automation: Drive the automation of key ODOO ERP processes. Develop Python and JavaScript apps for data processing and system integration.
     * Lead Development & Team: Write code while managing a small team. Balance hands-on coding with leadership to keep projects on track.
     * Product ownership: Work with team members to prioritize development tasks that align with business goals and deliver real value.
     * Process & Tools: Improve code reliability, CI/CD pipelines, ensure robust QA, and manage code reviews using GitLab/GitHub.

IT Landscape

     * ERP: Currently using ODOO V16, self-hosted. Plan to reduce customizations and migrate to Odoo.sh or potentially to ODOO Online.
     * E-commerce: Shopify Plus powers our online store on 6 domains.
     * Data & Cloud: Utilize Google Cloud for data lake and cloud functions, with BigQuery and Dataform for data management.
     * Automation & AI: Employ N8N for automation and explore integrations with Dify for LLM (Large Language Model) capabilities., * Flexible Working: While we prefer candidates in our Eindhoven office, we accept remote candidates, provided you are within a 3-hour time zone of the Netherlands. You'll need to be available during Dutch office hours.
     * High Responsibility & Growth: Enjoy a high level of responsibility and impact, with continuous learning and professional growth opportunities.
     * Team Collaboration: We value collaboration and regularly hold team gatherings, both virtual and in-person, to ensure everyone feels connected and aligned.

   If you're someone who enjoys both the strategic and the practical aspects of development and wants to be part of a small but ambitious team building the future of automated e-commerce, we'd love to hear from you!

Important

   The job requires to be available minimally 32 hours per week, with work scheduled during Dutch office hours. If you apply for a remote position and you're located outside of the Netherlands, you can join us full-time as an independent contractor. To some extent, we ignore geography in order to find the best person for each role. Due to the substantial differences between labor and business laws in each country, the easiest way to hire talent outside of our registered countries is through freelance contracts.
job_details.full_text:
Python software engineer - ERP and business processes

We are looking for a Python software engineer who is not only technically skilled but also hands-on and pragmatic. In this role, you will be responsible for both guiding our technical direction and being actively involved in development tasks. You'll work closely with our small team to ensure that our technology supports our business goals, and you'll play a key role in building and growing the team as we scale., * ERP development and Automation: Drive the automation of key ODOO ERP processes. Develop Python and JavaScript apps for data processing and system integration.
     * Lead Development & Team: Write code while managing a small team. Balance hands-on coding with leadership to keep projects on track.
     * Product ownership: Work with team members to prioritize development tasks that align with business goals and deliver real value.
     * Process & Tools: Improve code reliability, CI/CD pipelines, ensure robust QA, and manage code reviews using GitLab/GitHub.

IT Landscape

     * ERP: Currently using ODOO V16, self-hosted. Plan to reduce customizations and migrate to Odoo.sh or potentially to ODOO Online.
     * E-commerce: Shopify Plus powers our online store on 6 domains.
     * Data & Cloud: Utilize Google Cloud for data lake and cloud functions, with BigQuery and Dataform for data management.
     * Automation & AI: Employ N8N for automation and explore integrations with Dify for LLM (Large Language Model) capabilities., * Flexible Working: While we prefer candidates in our Eindhoven office, we accept remote candidates, provided you are within a 3-hour time zone of the Netherlands. You'll need to be available during Dutch office hours.
     * High Responsibility & Growth: Enjoy a high level of responsibility and impact, with continuous learning and professional growth opportunities.
     * Team Collaboration: We value collaboration and regularly hold team gatherings, both virtual and in-person, to ensure everyone feels connected and aligned.

   If you're someone who enjoys both the strategic and the practical aspects of development and wants to be part of a small but ambitious team building the future of automated e-commerce, we'd love to hear from you!

Important

   The job requires to be available minimally 32 hours per week, with work scheduled during Dutch office hours. If you apply for a remote position and you're located outside of the Netherlands, you can join us full-time as an independent contractor. To some extent, we ignore geography in order to find the best person for each role. Due to the substantial differences between labor and business laws in each country, the easiest way to hire talent outside of our registered countries is through freelance contracts.

profile_classification.rationale: The job description focuses heavily on traditional software engineering, ERP development, and automation using Python and JavaScript. While it mentions exploring integrations with Dify for LLM capabilities, this is a minor aspect and not the core focus. The role emphasizes business process automation and traditional software development over advanced generative AI model development, fine-tuning, or building complex GenAI applications. Therefore, it does not align with the core responsibilities of a GenAI Engineer or ML Engineer.

job_tasks.justification: The role explicitly mentions 'Python software engineer', 'develop Python and JavaScript apps', 'Write code', and 'hands-on coding', indicating traditional software development is a core responsibility.
The description states 'Develop Python and JavaScript apps for data processing and system integration', which are typical software development activities.
job_tasks.phrase: Develop Python and JavaScript apps for data processing and system integration

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'Write code' directly refers to software development.
The mention of 'hands-on coding' emphasizes the practical software development aspect of the role.
The role requires aligning technology with 'business goals' and prioritizing tasks that 'align with business goals and deliver real value', indicating a need to understand the business context.
job_tasks.phrase: align our technology supports our business goals

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'prioritize development tasks that align with business goals and deliver real value' shows a focus on business alignment.
job_tasks.phrase: prioritize development tasks that align with business goals and deliver real value

job_tasks.justification: Improving 'CI/CD pipelines' and ensuring 'robust QA' are key aspects of operations engineering and MLOps.
job_tasks.phrase: Improve code reliability, CI/CD pipelines, ensure robust QA

job_tasks.justification: The use of 'Google Cloud for data lake and cloud functions, with BigQuery and Dataform for data management' points to data engineering activities.
job_tasks.phrase: Google Cloud for data lake and cloud functions, with BigQuery and Dataform for data management

job_tasks.justification: The role involves 'automation of key ODOO ERP processes' and developing apps for 'system integration', which falls under software development for business processes.
job_tasks.phrase: automation of key ODOO ERP processes

job_tasks.justification: The mention of 'exploring integrations with Dify for LLM (Large Language Model) capabilities' indicates an interest in integrating AI, which is part of software development in this context.
job_tasks.phrase: explore integrations with Dify for LLM (Large Language Model) capabilities

job_tasks.justification: The mention of 'manage code reviews using GitLab/GitHub' is a practice within software development and MLOps for ensuring code quality and collaboration.
The description explicitly seeks a candidate who is 'hands-on and pragmatic' and emphasizes 'practical aspects of development'.
The role involves working 'closely with our small team' and 'Work with team members', highlighting collaboration.
The description mentions 'guiding our technical direction' and 'high level of responsibility and impact', suggesting ownership and initiative.
The job offers 'continuous learning and professional growth opportunities', indicating a need for adaptability and a learning mindset.
job_tasks.phrase: continuous learning and professional growth opportunities

job_tasks.justification: The emphasis on 'Team Collaboration' and holding 'team gatherings' points to strong communication and collaboration skills.

soft_skills.phrase: continuous learning and professional growth opportunities
